mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_tag (name, description, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, create_time, update_time FROM article_tag LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
SELECT t.id, t.name FROM article_tag t INNER JOIN article_tag_rel at ON t.id = at.tag_id WHERE at.article_id = #{articleId}
SELECT id, name, create_time, update_time FROM article_tag LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT at.article_id AS articleId, SUBSTRING_INDEX( GROUP_CONCAT(t.name ORDER BY t.id SEPARATOR ','), ',', 3 ) AS tags FROM article_tag_rel as at JOIN article_tag as t ON at.tag_id = t.id
WHERE at.article_id IN
#{id}
GROUP BY at.article_id
